Guanzon Mobitek provides you with the latest and most advance technology in the world of mobile phone. It does not only give you the gadget itself but also ensure you customer serve at its best.
With almost a hundred and fifty branches all over the Philippines, Guanzon Motorcycles ensures you the top and most trusted brand of motorcycles from Japan. (Honda, Yahama, Suzuki and Kawasaki). Assisted by our friendly Staff and Branch Heads, customers\' convenience and inquiries will be our utmost priority.
Someone has just login your account on other device. Someone has just register your gcard number on other account.
Your pre-order item has arrive on your selected Guanzon Branch. Your pre-order item is on its way to your selected Guanzon Branch.
Unable to reply a conversation for now.
We encourage you to share your suggestion and improvements with us. Please see the contact information in our branches. If you still dont see what youre looking for, please contact us. It all started with the thrill of riding a bicycle and the fondest memories it leaves in the mind of the little child…this is where the dream begun. Our roots can be traced from selling kalesa (horse cart)parts onto becoming a progressive and stable partner in the motorcycle and mobile phone retail sales. Now with 136 Motorcycle branches and 66 mobile phone shops, we continue to grow and expand with the commitment to loyalty, honesty and trust. The Guanzon Group of Companies, on its 73rd year, banners the continued success of its registered companies: Guanzon Merchandising Corporation (1983) LGK Guanzon Incorporated (1990) United Excelsior Marketing Incorporated (1998) Motorcentrum Corporation (2003) Guanzon Telecom (1998) Corporate Mission Guanzon Group of Companies will always strive in helping every Filipino make their life comfortable by providing the best and quality products and services. Corporate Vision The Guanzon Group visions to become a national brand and an economically resilient group that brings joy to the Organization and the communities it serves. Mission Statement Guanzon Group of Companies aims to: \n 1. To establish and maintain competitiveness in the motorcycle and mobile phone retail industry.\n 2. To attain and maintain a harmonious working relationship between the employees and the Management.\n 3. To provide an avenue where customers can enjoy the best value products and services.\n 4. To foster long term and stable relationship with suppliers thereby enhancing quality and reliability.\n 5. To uphold and maintain at all times the highest standard of business ethics. Corporate Philosophy Guanzon Group of Companies’ philosophy is about working hard — in harmony with others and always possess customer oriented set of minds. It is putting together substaintially to achieve Global Market Progress.
